power.description.modern_vampirism.swift:
The vampire gets a minor 
speed boost

The vampire gets a boost 
to digging speed

The vampire obtains 
increased step height

The vampire gets a major 
speed boost

The vampire gets a minor 
strength boost

The vampire gets 
a boost to defence

The vampire obtains ability to dig blocks

power.description.modern_vampirism.hipno:
The vampire obtains ability 
to attract animals

The vampire obtains ability 
to become temporally invisible

The vampire obtains ability 
to calm down their enemies

Villagers become more loyal 
to the vampire
power.description.modern_vampirism.witch:
The vampire heals on damaging 
other entities

Undeads become more loyal 
to the vampire

The vampire obtains ability 
to transform into a bat

The vampire obtains ability 
to summon vexes
